lead_paragraph: Juan Duran, an outfield prospect for the Cincinnati Reds, has been suspended for the first 80 games of the season after testing positive for three performance-enhancing substances.
snippet: Juan Duran, an outfield prospect for the Cincinnati Reds, has been suspended for the first 80 games of the season after testing positive for three performance-enhancing substances.
abstract: Cincinnati Reds prospect Juan Duran gets 80-game suspension after testing positive for performance-enhancing substances; other baseball news noted.
